name: El Tango de la Muerte
description: Do the tango to win the heart of your loved one! Each song in this casual RHYTHM game will unveil the story of Luciano and Martita. Influenced by games like OSU and Crypt of the Necrodancer, with a pinch of melodramatic humor, inspired by the best Latin American soap operas!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows xp, Windows 7, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core2 duo / AMD A4-3300M APU 1.90GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space
